mapper.sql: id, custom_order_id, custom_order_no, no, creator, created, update_user, update_time, completion_time, count, notes, amount, coordination_name, coordination_account, coordination_bank, is_pay, type, way,state, planned_time, actual_time,branch_id,order_product_id,permit,resource_type,plan_created,plan_creator,flag,logistics_company_id,logistics_no,delivered,deliverer,deliver_status,is_shipped

po.id, po.custom_order_id, po.custom_order_no, po.no, po.creator, po.created, po.update_user, po.update_time, po.completion_time, po.count, po.notes, po.amount, po.coordination_name, po.coordination_account, po.coordination_bank, po.is_pay,po.type, po.way,po.state, po.planned_time, po.actual_time, po.branch_id,po.order_product_id,po.permit,po.resource_type,po.plan_created,po.plan_creator,po.flag,po.logistics_company_id, po.logistics_no,po.delivered,po.deliverer,po.deliver_status,is_shipped

p.id, p.custom_order_id, p.custom_order_no, p.no, p.creator, p.created, p.update_user, p.update_time, p.completion_time, p.count, p.notes, p.amount, p.coordination_name, p.coordination_account, p.coordination_bank, p.is_pay, p.type, p.way,p.state, u.name creatorName,uu.name updateUserName, p.planned_time, p.actual_time,p.branch_id,p.order_product_id,p.permit,p.resource_type,p.plan_created,p.plan_creator,p.flag,p.logistics_company_id,p.logistics_no,p.delivered,p.deliverer,p.deliver_status,p.is_shipped,p.input_status,p.has_deliver_count
mapper.select: SELECT po.*,p.id payId,p.status,p.amount payamount,p.pay_amount realPayamount,p.funds,p.type payType,p.way payway,p.bank,cp.name dealerName,cp.address dealerAddress FROM produce_order po LEFT JOIN payment p ON p.custom_order_id = po.id LEFT JOIN custom_order co ON co.id = po.custom_order_id LEFT JOIN company cp ON cp.id = co.company_id where p.type ='4' and p.funds='44' and p.status ='0'

SELECT id,`count`,notes,type,way,coordination_name as coordinationName,amount,coordination_bank as coordinationBank,logistics_no logisticsNo, (case type when 0 then '柜体' when 1 then '门板' when 2 then '五金' ELSE '未知' END ) typeName , (case way when 0 then '自产' when 1 then '外协' when 2 then '特供实木' ELSE '未知' END ) wayName from produce_order where custom_order_id = #{orderId} and flag != 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO produce_order(id, custom_order_id, custom_order_no, no, creator, created, update_user, update_time, completion_time, count, notes, amount, coordination_name, coordination_account, coordination_bank, is_pay, type, way,state, planned_time, actual_time,branch_id,order_product_id,permit,resource_type,plan_created,plan_creator,flag,logistics_company_id,logistics_no,delivered,deliverer,deliver_status,is_shipped,input_status,has_deliver_count) VALUES(#{id}, #{customOrderId}, #{customOrderNo}, #{no}, #{creator}, #{created}, #{updateUser}, #{updateTime}, #{completionTime}, #{count}, #{notes}, #{amount}, #{coordinationName}, #{coordinationAccount}, #{coordinationBank}, #{pay}, #{type}, #{way},#{state}, #{plannedTime}, #{actualTime},#{branchId},#{orderProductId},#{permit},#{resourceType},#{planCreated},#{planCreator},#{flag},#{logisticsCompanyId},#{logisticsNo},#{delivered},#{deliverer},#{deliverStatus},#{shipped},#{inputStatus},#{hasDeliverCount})
mapper.update:
UPDATE produce_order
update_user = #{updateUser},
update_time = #{updateTime},
completion_time = #{completionTime},
count = #{count},
notes = #{notes},
no = #{no},
amount = #{amount},
coordination_name = #{coordinationName},
coordination_account = #{coordinationAccount},
coordination_bank = #{coordinationBank},
is_pay = #{pay},
type = #{type},
way = #{way},
state = #{state},
planned_time = #{plannedTime},
actual_time = #{actualTime},
order_product_id = #{orderProductId},
permit = #{permit},
plan_created = #{planCreated},
plan_creator = #{planCreator},
flag = #{flag},
logistics_company_id = #{logisticsCompanyId},
logistics_no = #{logisticsNo},
delivered = #{delivered},
deliverer = #{deliverer},
deliver_status = #{deliverStatus},
is_shipped = #{shipped},
input_status = #{inputStatus},
has_deliver_count = #{hasDeliverCount}
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select distinct
,b.value payName,bb.value typeName,bb.remark partMark ,bbb.value wayName,bbbb.value stateName ,bbbbb.value permitName,IFNULL(c.name,co.name) dealerName,c.id companyId ,IFNULL(cc.name,aa.customer_name )customerName,uuuu.name merchandiserName ,o.estimated_delivery_date estimatedDeliveryDate ,pay.audited payTime from produce_order p left join user u on p.creator = u.id left join user uu on p.update_user = uu.id left join basecode b on b.code = p.is_pay left join basecode bb on bb.code = p.type left join basecode bbb on bbb.code = p.way left join basecode bbbb on bbbb.code = p.state left join basecode bbbbb on bbbbb.code = p.permit left join custom_order o on o.id = p.custom_order_id left join aftersale_apply aa on aa.id=p.custom_order_id left join company c on c.id = o.company_id left join company co on co.id = aa.company_id left join company_customer cc on cc.id = o.customer_id left join user uuuu on o.merchandiser = uuuu.id left join payment pay on pay.custom_order_id = o.id where p.id = #{id} and (pay.funds = #{funds} or pay.funds is null) and (b.type = 'produceOrderPay' or b.type is null) and (bb.type = 'produceOrderType'or bb.type is null) and (bbb.type = 'produceOrderWay' or bbb.type is null) and (bbbb.type = 'produceOrderState' or bbbb.type is null) and (bbbbb.type = 'produceOrderPermit' or bbbbb.type is null) limit 1
select count(*) from produce_order where order_product_id=#{productId} and (flag =0 or flag is null) and state=2

select group_concat( DISTINCT (po.logistics_no),lc.name) as logisticsInfo from produce_order po left join logistics_company lc on lc.id=po.logistics_company_id where po.custom_order_id=#{OrderId} and po.logistics_no is not null GROUP BY po.logistics_no
select group_concat( DISTINCT (po.coordination_name)) as coordinationName from produce_order po where po.custom_order_id=#{OrderId} and po.coordination_name is not null GROUP BY po.coordination_name

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(count),0) num from produce_order
AND custom_order_id=#{orderId}

select p.* ,b.value payName,bb.value typeName,bb.remark partMark ,bbb.value wayName,bbbb.value stateName ,bbbbb.value permitName, lc.name logisticsCompany from produce_order p left join logistics_company lc on p.logistics_company_id =lc.id left join user u on p.creator = u.id left join user uu on p.update_user = uu.id left join basecode b on b.code = p.is_pay and (b.type = 'produceOrderPay' or b.type is null) left join basecode bb on bb.code = p.type and (bb.type = 'produceOrderType'or bb.type is null) left join basecode bbb on bbb.code = p.way and (bbb.type = 'produceOrderWay' or bbb.type is null) left join basecode bbbb on bbbb.code = p.state and (bbbb.type = 'produceOrderState' or bbbb.type is null) left join basecode bbbbb on bbbbb.code = p.permit and (bbbbb.type = 'produceOrderPermit' or bbbbb.type is null)
AND p.order_product_id = #{id} and (p.flag =0 or p.flag is null)
AND p.coordination_name = #{corporatePartnersName}
AND p.count is not null
select * from produce_order where order_product_id=#{productId} and type=#{type} and (flag =0 or flag is null)
select count(*) countDeliver,SUM(count) countInStock from produce_order where order_product_id=#{productId} and state >= #{state} and (flag =0 or flag is null)
select SUM(has_deliver_count) countInStock from produce_order where order_product_id=#{productId} and count is not null and (flag =0 or flag is null)
select SUM(count) countInStock from produce_order where order_product_id=#{productId} and count is not null and (flag =0 or flag is null)
select * from produce_order where order_product_id=#{orderProductId} and type=#{type} and way=#{way} and (flag =0 or flag is null)
mapper.update:
update produce_order set is_pay = true where custom_order_id = #{orderId} and (flag =0 or flag is null) and way in
#{way}

update produce_order
update_user = #{updateUser},
update_time = #{updateTime},
completion_time = #{completionTime},
count = #{count},
notes = #{notes},
amount = #{amount},
coordination_name = #{coordinationName},
coordination_account = #{coordinationAccount},
coordination_bank = #{coordinationBank},
is_pay = #{pay},
type = #{type},
way = #{way},
state = #{state},
planned_time = #{plannedTime},
actual_time = #{actualTime},
order_product_id = #{orderProductId},
permit = #{permit},
flag = #{flag},
logistics_company_id = #{logisticsCompanyId},
logistics_no = #{logisticsNo},
delivered = #{delivered},
deliverer = #{deliverer},
deliver_status = #{deliverStatus}
where id in
#{id}
mapper.select:
select distinct custom_order_id from produce_order where id in
#{id}

select p.*,IFNULL(c.name,cc.name) dealerName,IFNULL(c.founder_name,cc.founder_name) leaderName ,IFNULL(c.leader_tel,cc.leader_tel) leaderTel,IFNULL(customer.name,customer2.name) customerName,IFNULL(customer.phone,customer2.phone) customerTel ,IFNULL(customer.community,customer2.community) community from produce_order p left join custom_order o on p.custom_order_id = o.id left join aftersale_apply a on p.custom_order_id = a.id left join company cc on cc.id = a.company_id left join custom_order co on co.id = a.custom_order_id left join company_customer customer2 on co.customer_id = customer2.id left join company c on o.company_id = c.id left join company_customer customer on o.customer_id = customer.company_id where p.id = #{id}

select p.*,lc.name logisticsCompany,pp.order_parts_identify partMark,b.value typeName,bb.value wayName from produce_order p left join order_product op on op.id=p.order_product_id left join logistics_company lc on lc.id=p.logistics_company_id left join product_parts pp on pp.product_type=op.type and p.type=pp.parts_type and p.way=pp.produce_type left join basecode b on b.code=p.type and b.type='produceOrderType' left join basecode bb on bb.code=p.way and bb.type='produceOrderWay' where p.order_product_id=#{orderProductId} and (p.flag =0 or p.flag is null)

select (select count(*) from produce_order where branch_id=#{branchId} and (flag =0 or flag is null) and way=1 and DATE_FORMAT(created,'%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d'))as newNum, (select count(*) from produce_order where branch_id=#{branchId} and (flag =0 or flag is null) and way=1 and is_pay=0 )as afterNum, (select count(*) from produce_order where branch_id=#{branchId} and (flag =0 or flag is null) and way=1 and state=3)as endNum

select (select count(*) from order_product op left join custom_order co on op.custom_order_id = co.id where op.status='1' and co.branch_id=#{branchId}) as waitProduce, (select count(*) from order_product op left join custom_order co on op.custom_order_id = co.id where op.status='2' and co.branch_id=#{branchId}) as atProduce, (select count(*) from order_product op left join custom_order co on op.custom_order_id = co.id where op.status>'2' and co.branch_id=#{branchId}) as endProduce, (select count(*) from order_product op left join custom_order co on op.custom_order_id = co.id where op.status='2' and co.branch_id=#{branchId} and DATE_FORMAT(SUBDATE(op.plan_finish_time,interval 3 day), '%Y-%m-%d')<=DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(op.plan_finish_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') ) as matureProduce, (select count(*) from order_product op left join custom_order co on op.custom_order_id = co.id where co.branch_id=#{branchId} and op.status=2 and DATE_FORMAT(op.plan_order_finish_time, '%Y-%m-%d') < DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') ) as lateProduce
